lexUnit.name: sad.a

corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

lexUnit.definition: COD: causing or characterized by sorrow or regret.

sentence.text: This , undoubtedly , is how the leader of the most intensely sad and beautiful band of 1992 really should behave .
